Ivanka OPO Hotel Manager LLC (Management of DC Hotel)

familyMemberEthics.description: Former president of OPO Hotel Manager LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, is not inactive nor dormant, and is not part of an entity structure or license deal.
familyMemberEthics.business: OPO Hotel Manager LLC (Management of DC Hotel)

familyMemberEthics.description: Former director/chairman/president of OPO Hotel Manager Member Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
familyMemberEthics.business: OPO Hotel Manager Member Corp. (Pass-thru Company for OPO Hotel Manager LLC)

familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump served as President, Secretary, Member & Treasurer of IVANKA OPO HOTEL MANAGER LLC (management of DC hotel) from Jun 1, 2013, until Jan 1, 2017. Because she retains an equity interest, this potential conflict of interest is marked as active.
familyMemberEthics.business: Ivanka OPO Hotel Manager LLC (Management of DC Hotel)
